document.full_text: it took japan's miki ando just four minutes to boost the spirits of her devastated nation after she unexpectedly glided to gold at the world figure skating championships.
document.title: ando lifts japanese spirits after striking gold
lines_and_colors: it took japan's miki ando just four minutes to boost the spirits of her devastated nation after she unexpectedly glided to gold at the world figure skating championships.
